featured.text: What does Zeke Emanuel have in mind when saying “What did Mom put in the cereal?” (A)
To what do you attribute the Emanuel brothers’ success?
I wrote Brothers Emanuel because I had begun jotting stories for my kids.

other.text: What does Zeke Emanuel think of the modern conveniences mentioned in the interview? (A)
Which of the following best summarizes Zeke Emanuel’s response to the last question?
According to Zeke Emanuel, which of the following is a reason for the brothers’ success? (A)

definition.zh_def: 以馬內利，意指「神與我們同在」的名字，常用於基督教文獻中。
definition.en_def: A name meaning 'God is with us,' often used in Christian contexts.
definition.example: Emanuel is a popular name in many cultures, especially among those with Christian beliefs.
